name: Royal Thief
description:
Decide and so the RIGHT THINGS

Royal Thief is an RPG, adventure game. You will play as a thief who has requested people to steal goods inside the place and bring them back. Players have to find a way to reach the room that contains the villager's request. Beware, avoid, and don't capture the soldier inside the building.

  • Discover the background story behind the task.
  • Decide to fulfill the task or not!
  • Sneak into the place and Get out within the time limit.

Controls: Keyboards

Movement W , A , S , DJumpSpace barI Open Note listESCPause Game

Art Asset: Medieval Pixelart  from BlackSpire Studio

This is the part of university  studying project  

Subject: IDD357 Digital Technology for game Design
